name: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Ages
synopsis: Veran, the Sorceress of Shadows, has captured the Oracle of Ages to change history! Link must bend time with the Harp of Ages to save the Oracle, but the clock is ticking… Embark on a time-spanning adventure, where your actions in the past affect the future. Befriend animals to aid you, collect mysterious rings and conquer eight dungeons to recover the Essences of Time. Plus - link with The Legend of Zelda™: Oracle of Seasons via passwords to conclude your quest. Unlock secrets in both games, carry over items and reveal the ultimate boss battle!
